Owusu A
Kizito (amụrụ Eprel 09, 1976) bụ onye ọchụnta ego America na ọkachamara ụlọ nke sitere na Ghana
Ọ bụ onye nchoputa na CEO nke InvestiGroup Companies.
A mụrụ Owusu A
Kizito na Ghana na Eprel 9, 1976 n'ezinụlọ Katọlik.
Na 2004 Owusu malitere MBA ya na Mahadum Hawaii Pacific.
Na 2014 ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta Dọkịta nke Business Administration na Mahadum Phoenix.
Na 2006 Owusu A
Kizito tọrọ ntọala Investigroup LLC na ụlọ ọrụ na New Jersey na New York
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ lekwasịrị anya na ịgakwuru ụlọ ọrụ ndị nwere ọkara na North America.
Na Julaị 2015 Kizito haziri mmemme omenala mba ụwa yana otu United Nations Commutech Group (UNCG) na isi ụlọ ọrụ United Nations na New York.
Na 2018 Kizito mepụtara gọọmentị kwadoro mmekorita ya na ndị ọrụ nkwekọrịta na ndị na-etinye ego dị ka Omani billionaire P
Mohamed Ali na-arụ ọrụ na 10 afọ okporo ụzọ okporo ụzọ Ghanian okporo ụzọ.
Ahụmahụ dị ndụ nke Mweghasị n'ụlọ na-akpata na ahụike uche na nke anụ ahụ: Ọmụmụ ihe ọmụmụ phenomenological 2015)
Nbipụta ibe
New York
Mmetụta ọjọọ nke mwepu n'ụlọ na ihe ize ndụ nke uche na nke anụ ahụ (2015)
International Journal of Risk and Contingency Management
